definition: A device typically found in households and electronic equipment, used for connecting and transmitting signals between different devices or components. It is commonly used to establish a secure and stable connection between cables, ensuring efficient data transfer and communication.

examples.german: Bitte stecken Sie den Stecker in die Kabelbuchse.
examples.english: Please plug the plug into the cable socket.

examples.german: Die Kabelbuchse ist an der Rückseite des Fernsehers.
examples.english: The cable socket is at the back of the television.

examples.german: Die Kabelbuchse ist mit einem Schutzdeckel versehen.
examples.english: The cable socket is equipped with a protective cover.

examples.german: Die Kabelbuchse ermöglicht den Anschluss externer Geräte.
examples.english: The cable socket allows the connection of external devices.
